strapiPost.title: Mr. Gatti's Pizza Bringing Two Locations To NWA
strapiPost.content:
The Texas-based Mr. Gatti's Pizza is set to open five locations in Arkansas, with two headed our way in Bentonville and Fayetteville.

  • Prize pizza: The pizza-buffet chain is known for its mouth-watering pizza and family-friendly entertainment centers with state-of-the-art games for all ages.
  • Party zone: Mr. Gatti's will provide another fun option for family outings and is sure to be a popular spot for birthday parties and get-togethers.

Read more in About You HERE.
